dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
AutoDetectedBrowser: Firefox
AutoDetectedOS: Windows 7
IIILanguage: en
IssueType: lr_circumvention
Language: en
agree: checked
circumvention_additional_comments:
circumvention_injured: The blog is posting the full copyrighted text of  
articles I have written exclusively for About.com by using code to  
circumvent the About.com What's Hot RSS feed settings, which is set  
headline and extract only not full text. The duplicate text on this  
Blogspot blog not only means readers of this blog don't need to come onto  
my pages, thus losing me page views and earnings, but duplicate text has a  
negative impact on how Google Search perceives my original material,  
especially post-Panda.
circumvention_what_product: fulltextrssfeed.com
circumvention_what_ways: This Blogspot site is using fulltextrssfeed.com to  
bypass the settings of the Painting.About.com What's Hot RSS feed in order  
to post onto Blogspot the full text of pages, which is my copyright text  
and written exclusively for About.com
companyname: Painting About.com
country_residence: GB
full_name: Marion Boddy-Evans
represented_copyright_holder_circumvention: Marion Boddy-Evans
